title: Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'Subscribe' button opens the newsletter subscription modal.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button in the top navigation bar.
expected_result: A modal should appear prompting the user to enter their email for newsletter subscription.

title: Discord Button Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'Discord' button opens the Discord community modal.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Discord' button in the top navigation bar.
expected_result: A modal should appear with information about joining the Discord community.

title: Archive Button Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'Archive' button redirects to the archive page.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Archive' button in the top navigation bar.
expected_result: The user should be redirected to a page displaying archived content.

title: Star Button Functionality
description: Verify that clicking the 'Star' button increases the star count.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Star' button in the top navigation bar.
expected_result: The star count should increase by one.

title: Light/Dark Mode Toggle
description: Verify that clicking the 'Light' button toggles the webpage theme between light and dark mode.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Light' button in the top navigation bar.
expected_result: The webpage theme should toggle between light and dark mode.

title: Search Functionality
description: Verify that entering a query in the search bar and pressing enter displays relevant search results.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Enter a search query in the 'Search articles...' field. 3. Press the 'Enter' key.
expected_result: The page should display articles related to the search query.

title: Newsletter Modal Email Validation
description: Verify that the newsletter subscription modal validates email input.
steps: 1. Open the newsletter subscription modal. 2. Enter an invalid email format (e.g., 'testemail.com'). 3. Click 'Subscribe Now'.
expected_result: An error message should be displayed indicating the email format is invalid.

title: Newsletter Subscription Success
description: Verify successful subscription to the newsletter with a valid email.
steps: 1. Open the newsletter subscription modal. 2. Enter a valid email address (e.g., 'test@example.com'). 3. Click 'Subscribe Now'.
expected_result: A success message should be displayed confirming the subscription.

title: Discord Modal Join Button
description: Verify that clicking the 'Join Discord' button in the Discord modal redirects to the Discord invitation page.
steps: 1. Open the Discord community modal. 2. Click 'Join Discord'.
expected_result: The user should be redirected to the Discord invitation page.

title: Article Links Functionality
description: Verify that clicking on 'Original Article' and 'HN Discussion' links opens the respective pages.
steps: 1. Navigate to an article section. 2. Click on 'Original Article'. 3. Click on 'HN Discussion'.
expected_result: Each link should open the respective page in a new tab.
